job_tasks.phrase: Utilize techniques such as prompt engineering, embeddings, and tool/function calling to develop innovative solutions with generative AI
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the application and development of generative AI techniques like prompt engineering and embeddings, which are core to building AI models.

job_tasks.phrase: Ensure that our AI platform and features are fast, reliable, and scale effectively as we continue to grow and enhance the AI user experience for all customers
job_tasks.justification: This involves building and maintaining production-grade user-facing software systems and ensuring their performance and scalability.

job_tasks.phrase: Work closely with product designers to create intuitive interfaces for our in-app AI assistant, ensuring a great experience for our users
job_tasks.justification: This describes the software development aspect of integrating AI features into user interfaces and focusing on user experience.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with machine learning engineers to develop and implement advanced ML models that drive our AI-powered features
job_tasks.justification: This indicates involvement in implementing and integrating ML models into software features, a key software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: enhance the AI user experience for all customers
job_tasks.justification: This phrase highlights the focus on customer experience, indicating an understanding of business goals related to user satisfaction.

soft_skills.phrase: Work independently in a team and deliver high-quality code in a timely manner
enhance the AI user experience for all customers

classification.rationale: The job description strongly emphasizes working with LLMs, prompt engineering, embeddings, and developing user-facing AI features. It explicitly mentions building and enhancing the AI user experience, which aligns perfectly with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer focused on user-facing applications.
